The normal charbroiled octopus is about two tentacles. They give you 4 tentacles. The chargrilled is good but need to perfect it. The marinated spice is perfect but the grill technique need improvement to seal the tentacles juice. 

The services are good. I like food. They have good quantities.

One of the few oriental grocery that open during pandemic. Mainly Vietnamese customers are visiting this store. Most food are also gear for Vietnamese food. The store is kind of strange. It link to jewelry store next door. 

The items are not as complete compare to larger grocery store. But is it convenient for the local to pick up item they need. Aisle is a bit narrow to save space for more good to display. The munchies aisle is limited. I could not find the items I like. 

Selection of item is good enough for you to cook a meal.

I have been to many burger join, the smashburger is the first. I was excited to try out some new burger. They carry burger, chicken, salad and shake. Very simple menu. They have options to order online and they also have options to create your own sandwich. 

I got the Swiss Truffle Mushroom. The burger is juicy and seem like cook with butter. It is definitely moist and great mushroom cream sauce. The charge above $7 a burger. Pricy. The bun and burger is tinny. It is like burger junior. For the price, I may not want this burger. 

The open late till 10 pm. Not many customers during that time. I only have wait 5 minutes for them to cook. The meal is add additional 5 bucks. I decided not to. The whole combo may be difficult to attract customers. But their side is good choice. It include grilled Brussels sprouts.

I would said this restaurant is in the middle of the pack. May be their high star rating is due to the local favorite. The restaurant is located on the corner of the plaza. It also serves sushi. They no longer take yelp 15% off coupon. 

We started with the Tom yum chicken soup. It has some flavor of Thai but not strong enough. Soup a bit salty. We have the chicken satay appetizer. I think this is their best dish. The entree we have pad Thai. I think they can do a better job on this one. The peanut sauce is not a lot. The noodle is ok. We also got the drunken noodle that not in the menu. But I am disappointed for not spicy enough when I have order the Thai hot. Second, they noodle in the wok seem like just a small BTU technique which I can do it at home. If I order this in restaurant, I expect high BTU wok with burn oil cooking. I cannot find it here. The last dish is the duck basil. The duck is filet. The dish is sweet. I would said is a ok dish. 

Overall my experience is average. The dishes are  too Americanize. They need to paid attention to customers requests of how spicy the dish. Chef technique need to improve. I would said is take out quality.

Oh well, this is average among the restaurant over here. Marrow do have some Americans cuisine. However, what I take for this restaurant may not measure to the value you paid while other restaurant may be do better than them. 

We were here to try their food first time. We have the Tavern 'slammin' steak sandwich. With upgrade side to grilled asparagus it is close to $20 dish. I expect this should be smashing dish. It turn out the meat is is just few cold cut on hot bun. I have give them with nice skirt steak. But it is cold cut. The upgrade asparagus only come in 4 strings. 

The second dish is better. The chicken stack. It is grilled. Also about same price I have for steak sandwich. In compare to near by restaurant, I think the nearby restaurant may be better. I know the competition is tough. But I think they can do better. 

Our service is good. Just some time they waitress not paid the highest attention to our table during meal. But when get paid, it was quick.

If you come drink is good. If you come for food, this may not a good choice. World of beer surprise me that they serve food. However, the food come out of the kitchen is too slow. Menu do not have good choices. 

I got one of the special mojito. But I feel the cocktail is too light on the alcohol percentage. The drink feel like soft drink. Unless you go with their draft beer or bottle beer. Other than that, I not recommend their cocktails. 

We order three tacos for snacks, it take 30 minutes to come out. I think this area need big improvement. The shrimp taco save them one stars. If not it is 2.5 stars.

This Kung Fu tea is in the middle of the pack. We got the coffee slush with boba and the winter melon milk tea. I agree with Vivian that they need to improve the mixologist of the tea. Somehow it do not have the taste of harmony. The ingredients is good. The honey boba is still very good. But the the tea bitterness need to tone down. Caffeine is well maintained but the the tea bitterness somehow need to reduce. Milk is a bit heavy compare to many milk tea I have tasted. 

This restaurant has token ramen section. We did not try their food this time. But will plan next visit to try their hot food. I like the open kitchen with glass wall allow the customers see their food preparation. It has increased the interest of the food.
